original_text: And I will set the Egyptians against the Egyptians: and they shall fight every one against his brother, and every one against his neighbour; city against city, and kingdom against kingdom.
korean_text: 내가 애굽인을 격동하여 애굽인을 치리니 그들이 각기 형제를 치며 각기 이웃을 칠 것이요 성읍이 성읍을 치며 나라가 나라를 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: And I will set the Egyptians against the Egyptians
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이집트 사람들을 서로 대적하게 하리니

sentences.original_text: and they shall fight every one against his brother
and every one against his neighbour
